name: Media Copyright
author: Weltenretter UG

sections.description:
Plugin to handle media copyright data in a tool. Therewith you can edit
– copyright requirement
– copyright expiration date
– copyright-text
– copyright-url

If copyright is required and any information is missing, there are admin-messages in dashboard an tool-page with hints what is missing.
sections.installation:
To use this plugin upload the zip file to your wordpress-plugins and activate it. Now you can find the tool in the sidebar and use the shortcode

[wr-media-copyright][/wr-media-copyright]

to render a list of media attachments in frontend.

short_description: Plugin to manage copyrights for all the media in wordpress. See status in admin-backend and show table with information in frontend.
